entries.journal_entry_description: You've agreed to learn the trade of personal protection, working as a bodyguard under Peawp R'dawc.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You've been given a contract to protect a client while he's repairing some harvesters in the desert. He's informed Peawp that he will meet you at this location. The client is of the Nikto species and goes under the name Tobo.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You failed the escort! Return to Peawp with the bad news.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Ask the client where you need to go to next.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The client has provided you with a waypoint to the harvesters. Take him there safely.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Talk to the client and make sure this is the right location.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: A Tusken scout has spotted you. Kill him before he can get a warning off to his friends!
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Make sure the client is okay and see if he's almost done.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Return closer to the city with the client. He's provided you with a waypoint.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: Talk to the client and make sure that he'll be safe from here by himself.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: The contract is complete. Return to Peawp with the good news!
